value:
$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|Altina is a legendary queen, yet she
does not possess even a hint of
arrogance. I must follow her example.

$nMPID_双界オルティナ|I can sense a powerful determination
in Edelgard's eyes. Her gaze is fixed
firmly on the future she desires.

$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|There is still much I can learn, even at
the beach. Seizing such opportunities
demands ambition and force of will.

$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|I never imagined I would wear
something like this... Though, I have
not had many chances to before now.

$nMPID_双界オルティナ|Don't worry, Alondite and Ragnell are
in good hands. I can't exactly go
swimming with them, after all!

$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|Lady Altina, I have carried out
$Nf's errand.$k$pLet us return at once.

$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|No matter how tall the waves
crashing down upon us are, we will
push through them and press on!

$nMPID_双界オルティナ|Now that we finally have a chance to
relax, I will not allow anything to get
in our way!

$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|Ugh... I truly am not suited to the
water, am I?

$nMPID_双界オルティナ|Are these the blessings of the sun?
In that case, I will gladly accept them.

Let's go, Lady Altina! We have
an entire tropical island to
explore together!

$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|Thank you very much, Lady Altina.
Thanks to you, I was able to become
more comfortable with the ocean.$k$p$nMPID_双界オルティナ|Edelgard, please—there is no need to
thank me. I have enjoyed the time
we've spent together.$k$pIt is a pleasure to see you freed, at
least briefly, of the burdens that
come with governing a country.$k$p$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|I feel the same way, though... From
watching you, I have realized that
there is still much I must learn.$k$p$nMPID_双界オルティナ|In that case, I have but one request
for you, Edelgard.$k$pWould you please continue to be my
friend, even after the summer is over?$k$p$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|Nothing would make me happier than
if we continued to help each other
grow. Now then, take my hand!
Yah!
Take this!
Kyah!
Drowning...
My leg...
$nMPID_二人|Succumb to the waves!
$nMPID_二人|A summer... To remember!
$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|I do not play games.
$nMPID_双界オルティナ|Fun in the sun!
I detest swimming...
I wish you luck.
I'll study your technique.

"We will settle this!"
"So we shall!"

"Queens of the seas!"
"Do not doubt it!"
*Chuckle*

"I'm not fond of the water."
"Don't worry! Come on, I'll show you."
Aah!
I'll face it head-on.
Let's swim!

$nMPID_双界オルティナ|Such beautiful waters... Come,
Edelgard. Let's go for a swim.

$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|No, thank you. I'll just stay here and
relax. You should enjoy yourself.
$nMPID_双界オルティナ|Could it be that you can't swim?

$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|Not...exactly. I just prefer to avoid
the water.
$nMPID_双界オルティナ|I see. Well, then I'll stay.

$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|Don't feel you must hold back on
my account. Please, go and swim.
I'll be fine right here.

$nMPID_双界オルティナ|It is no matter. I am a bit
surprised, however.

You're so self-assured. But I suppose
even you must struggle with some
things. We all do, after all.

$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|Naturally... For my part, I am a bit
surprised by you as well.

Of course I am well aware of your
stature, a legendary queen... Yet
I find you so approachable.

$nMPID_双界オルティナ|If that is indeed so, I would say we're
cut from the same cloth.

$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|You may be right. And if that is so,
perhaps this will appeal to you...

What do you say to skipping the
usual activities? Let's spend the day
doing nothing more than relaxing...$k$pand sampling the local delicacies.
I've always wanted to do that.

$nMPID_双界オルティナ|Oh, I hadn't even considered it. But
now that you mention it, it does
sound enticing...

Very well! Let's make that dream into
reality. It is, after all, just one day.

$nMPID_双界エーデルガルト|I was hoping you'd say that. We can
spend a relaxing day together, just
as I'd hoped.

$nMPID_双界オルティナ|It's settled, then! Think of it...
a vacation! I can hardly wait.
Hee hee!
